question.title: The Max of an Array with a Range
question.text: Write a method arrayMax(int[] x, int n, int m) that takes an array x as an input and returns the maximum element of x between the element with index n and the element with index m. Test your code with arrayMax(new int[]{1, 3, 10, 9, 3, 8, 5}, 3, 5). The result should be 9.
